1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah bin Mas'ud said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'No one of you should bathe in open land or on a roof where he is not concealed; even if he does not see anyone, he can still be seen

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الاِسْتِتَارِ عِنْدَ الْغُسْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated about being concealed when bathing
